name: Tongari Boushi to Mahou no Machi
name_original: Tongari Boushi to Mahou no Machi
description:
*'Tongari Boushi to Mahou no Machi' (とんがりボウシと魔法の町 "Pointy hats and the Magic Town") is a fantasy-adventure life simulation game developed and published by Konami. It was released for Nintendo 3DS on December 10th, 2012 in Japan only. It is the fourth entry of the Magician's Quest series, and the only installment for the Nintendo 3DS.

*"Magic Town" follows the systems and elements of previous titles, setting in a magical world and communicating with the residents who appear in the game. This time in the town a huge shopping mall was built. Players can enjoy magic, fashion, and the development of their own shop. A system has been added that allowed real shops to appear in the game by downloading real shops. As of September 2020, downloading items and shops has been discontinued.

(*Source of Description - 'Magician's Quest Fandom Wiki'; 'Tongari Boushi to Mahou no Machi')
